column5: This almost beach front property is on the first row with unobstructed ocean views. Four bedrooms: which offers two master suites, both with king size beds and two bedrooms and 3 1/2 baths. Plenty of space in this open floor plan that has several decks for enjoying the sun. You have space to entertain not only inside the beach home but also underneath where you will find a large built in bar, picnic table and a private outdoor shower.
